definition: A food item that is derived from milk and is commonly consumed as part of a balanced diet. It is often used as an ingredient in various recipes and can be found in a variety of forms, such as solid, liquid, or semi-solid. This term encompasses a wide range of products that are primarily made from milk and are known for their nutritional value.

examples.english: Dairy products are rich in calcium.
Yogurt is a popular dairy product.

examples.german: Butter und Käse sind ebenfalls Milchprodukte.
examples.english: Butter and cheese are also dairy products.

examples.german: Milchprodukte können bei manchen Menschen Allergien auslösen.
examples.english: Dairy products can cause allergies in some people.

examples.german: Es gibt viele verschiedene Arten von Milchprodukten.
examples.english: There are many different types of dairy products.
